mapper.select: SELECT BLOG_RSS_SEQ, AUTHOR, CATEGORY, TITLE, LINK, DESCRIPTION, PUB_DATE, USE_YN, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE FROM TB_BLOG_RSS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BLOG_RSS ( BLOG_RSS_SEQ, AUTHOR, CATEGORY, TITLE, LINK, DESCRIPTION, PUB_DATE, USE_YN, REG_DATE, UPT_DATE )VALUES( #{blogRssSeq}, #{author}, #{category}, #{title}, #{link}, #{description}, STR_TO_DATE(#{pubDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), #{useYn}, NOW(), NULL )
